name: Dubu Rush
description:
Game Overview

Title: 'Dubu Rush'
Genre: Adventure

Game features

  • One button operation method
  • Cute dot character
  • Beat and fun music

Game story

Warriors fight the king to save this world. However, the king is too high because it is very high. So you need to help you reach the king to this hero.

How to win

To clear the game, use the Jump button to increase the dragon.

Game stage

The stage of this game consists of five layers. Each layer consists of design and difficulty of each theme.

Chaos system

In order to adjust the difficulty of the game, there is a hidden stage that the player suffered from the player with the number of facedlets uploaded by the player.

Save function

ㅤThe player's location and time are saved automatically. And when it is cleared, the clear time of the player is registered in the high score. Therefore, the player needs to go up quickly to get a high score.
